com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.domain.component.model.create

Class WebCmsComponentAutoCreateService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.domain.component.model.create.WebCmsComponentAutoCreateService

  • @Service
public class WebCmsComponentAutoCreateService
extends Object
    Central API for automatic creation of WebCmsComponentModel. Usually triggered
    Since:
    0.0.2
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Method Detail

      • resolveComponentType

        public WebCmsComponentType resolveComponentType(String componentTypeName)
        Attempts to resolve a requested component type by its type key. If none is specified, the default type will be returned.

        If a name is specified but no type can be found with that key, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.

        Parameters:
        componentTypeName - requested
        Returns:
        component type

      • createComponent

        @Transactional
public WebCmsComponentModel createComponent(WebCmsComponentAutoCreateTask task)
        Create all components represented by a single task.
        Parameters:
        task - representing the components to create
        Returns:
        component model of the root component created

      • buildComponent

        public WebCmsComponentModel buildComponent(WebCmsComponentAutoCreateTask task)
        Builds the component model represented by a single task, but does not save it. Useful for strategy implementations that want to build child tasks.
        Parameters:
        task - representing the components to build
        Returns:
        component model of the root component created

      • setDefaultComponentType

        public void setDefaultComponentType(String defaultComponentType)
        The component type that should be used for all tasks where there is no explicit component type specified and there are no child tasks (not a container).
